data.question: What problem are you trying to solve?
choices: a. Are you feeling priced out of health insurance for yourself or your family and looking for a more affordable way to manage healthcare expenses?
b. Are you a business owner who is feeling priced out of offering health insurance to your employees?
c. Are you tired of paying into a brokes healthcare system for which cists continue to rise?
d. Are you tired of not getting a straight answer on costs between your healthcare provider and your insurance company?
e. Have you left a job and are looking for an alternative to your previous insurance plan?

data.question: Do you think transparency is important when it comes to healthcare?
Do you love the sharing economy concept (Airbnb, Lyft, Gofundme, Kickstarter, Kiva, etc.) and would be interested to learn how this concept can be applied to medical costs?
Do you strive for a healthy lifestyle and believe that it benefits your overall health and wellness?
Where did you hear about us?
choices: f. Social Media - FB, Instagram, Linkedin, Twitter, TikTok

data.question: (Business Only) Do you have 5 or more individuals at your company?
(Business Only) Which best describes your team?
